EmailTemplate.subject: Final Days: Sell Solar, Go to March Madness!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The last time Boston hosted the Elite Eight, the Olympics were in London & Obama was the President.
Take advantage of this rare opportunity to catch the Elite Eight NCAA March Madness Games this year in our home city of Boston!
The competition remains fierce to be the BlueWave partner with the most loan sales between February 12th, 2018 and this coming Sunday, March 11th.
Remember, in addition to March Madness tickets all loan sales are eligible for the BlueWave Bonus program, celebrating your first deal with swag and your 5th deal with $100! Let's see who takes the lead in the final days of this competition!
BONUS POINTS FOR COMMUNITY SOLAR
In addition to a prize for the most loan sales, we will be awarding 2 tickets to the NCAA SWEET SIXTEEN games in Boston on Friday, March 23rd.
Note: You must have a signed SSA in place with BlueWave in order to sell Community Solar Shares, please reach out to BlueWave Partner Support to learn more.
Terms & Conditions:
Sales must be tracked to individual BlueWave portal login email addresses. Mass Solar Loan sales are not eligible for this promotion. Loans closed between 5:00pm (2/12/18) and 11:00pm on Selection Sunday (3/11/18) are eligible. We will announce the winning sales rep on Monday, March 12th, 2018 via phone call from your BlueWave partner. BlueWave will not cover any associated travel expenses to attend these games. Tickets are approximately $450 in market value- don't miss out!
Good luck!
- All of us here at BlueWave
